Title: Mischief Mischief
Writer: Jenji Kohan (created by), Anthony Natoli, Anthony Natoli (story editor), Merritt Tierce (staff writer)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Natasha Lyonne, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks
Plot: Pranksters wreak havoc on Halloween. Luschek earns points with the other guards. As Linda faces a crisis, Donuts and Pennsatucky have a change of plans.
